code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant TQ as TickerQ Engine
    participant EX as Job Executor
    participant DR as Dependency Resolver
    participant DB as Database
    participant CA as Client App

    TQ->>EX: JobList Triggered
    EX->>DB: Get JobList with Jobs
    EX->>DR: Validate DAG (Cycle Check)
    DR-->>EX: Valid DAG

    EX->>DB: Create JobListExecution Record
    EX->>DR: Get Topological Sort Order
    DR-->>EX: Execution Order [J1, J2, J3, J4]

    Note over EX: Execute in Waves (Parallel where possible)

    rect rgb(200, 230, 201)
        Note over EX,CA: Wave 1: Jobs with no dependencies
        par Execute J1
            EX->>CA: Execute J1
            CA-->>EX: Success
        and Execute J2
            EX->>CA: Execute J2
            CA-->>EX: Success
        end
        EX->>DB: Log J1, J2 Results
    end

    rect rgb(187, 222, 251)
        Note over EX,CA: Wave 2: Jobs depending on Wave 1
        EX->>CA: Execute J3 (depends on J1, J2)
        CA-->>EX: Success
        EX->>DB: Log J3 Result
    end

    rect rgb(255, 249, 196)
        Note over EX,CA: Wave 3: Jobs depending on Wave 2
        EX->>CA: Execute J4 (depends on J3)
        CA-->>EX: Success
        EX->>DB: Log J4 Result
    end

    EX->>DB: Complete JobListExecution
    EX-->>TQ: JobList Execution Complete
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
